name: Extracteur de factures aliment√© par l'IA via Telegram vers Airtable
description:
## üìÑ Description

Ce flux de travail automatise l'extraction de donn√©es de factures structur√©es √† partir de fichiers PDF envoy√©s via Telegram et les stocke dans Airtable. Il utilise GPT-4o pour un parsing intelligent et inclut une m√©moire conversationnelle pour une exp√©rience utilisateur fluide. Con√ßu pour les entreprises et les freelances qui re√ßoivent des factures num√©riquement et souhaitent rationaliser leur tenue de dossiers.

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è Comment √ßa fonctionne

1. **D√©clencheur Telegram** ‚Äì √âcoute les messages entrants et les pi√®ces jointes PDF.  
2. **Noeud Switch** ‚Äì Filtre les messages pour s'assurer que seuls les PDF sont trait√©s.  
3. **Extraire du fichier** ‚Äì Analyse le contenu PDF pour l'extraction de texte.  
4. **Modifier les champs** ‚Äì Pr√©pare les donn√©es extraites pour le traitement par l'IA.  
5. **Agent IA (GPT-4o)** ‚Äì Orchestration du flux de travail, invite l'utilisateur √† fournir des informations manquantes et extrait des donn√©es structur√©es.  
6. **M√©moire simple** ‚Äì Maintient le contexte conversationnel √† travers les sessions.  
7. **Cr√©er une facture (outil Airtable)** ‚Äì Cr√©e un nouvel enregistrement de facture dans Airtable.  
8. **Cr√©er un article (outil Airtable)** ‚Äì Ajoute des articles individuels li√©s √† la facture.  
9. **R√©ponse Telegram** ‚Äì Envoie une confirmation √† l'utilisateur.

---

## üîê Identifiants requis

Pour ex√©cuter ce flux de travail avec succ√®s, vous aurez besoin de :

- **Jeton de bot Telegram** (via @BotFather)  
- **Cl√© API OpenAI** (avec acc√®s √† GPT-4o)  
- **Cl√© API Airtable** et acc√®s √† :  
  - Base : `Suivi des factures`  
  - Tables : `Factures` et `Articles`

---

## üß∞ Structure Airtable

**Champs de la table Factures** :
- Num√©ro de facture  
- Date  
- Fournisseur  
- Adresse du fournisseur  
- ID fiscal  
- Num√©ro de commande  
- Date d'√©ch√©ance  
- Nom du destinataire  
- Adresse du destinataire  
- Date de livraison  
- Total des taxes  
- Montant total  

**Champs de la table Articles** :
- Code produit  
- Description  
- Prix unitaire  
- Quantit√©  
- Type d'unit√©  
- Sous-total  
- Facture (li√©e)

---

## üß† Fonctionnalit√©s

- Parsing de factures aliment√© par l'IA  
- Extraction de texte PDF  
- Cr√©ation d'enregistrements Airtable avec liaison relationnelle  
- Interaction utilisateur bas√©e sur Telegram  
- M√©moire conversationnelle  
- Gestion des erreurs et validation des donn√©es

parameters.toolDescription: Create a new invoice record in Airtable

options.systemMessage:
=You are a helpful assistant that extracts structured data from invoices and logs it into Airtable.

‚∏ª

üßë‚Äçüíº Step 1: Ask for the Company or Individual Name

Before we begin, please provide the company or individual name associated with this invoice.

Wait for the user‚Äôs input and store this as client_name.

‚∏ª

üìé Step 2: Ask for Invoice Upload

Now, please upload the invoice.

Once uploaded, continue with data extraction.

‚∏ª

üì§ Step 3: Extract Invoice-Level Information

From the invoice, extract the following fields and prepare to create a record in the Invoices table:
	‚Ä¢	Invoice Number
	‚Ä¢	Invoice Date
	‚Ä¢	Supplier
	‚Ä¢	Supplier Address
	‚Ä¢	Supplier Tax ID
	‚Ä¢	PO Number
	‚Ä¢	Due Date
	‚Ä¢	Total Tax (as number only, no currency symbols)
	‚Ä¢	Total Amount (as number only, no currency symbols)
	‚Ä¢	Client Name (use the input from Step 1)

Use the Create Invoice tool and remember the returned record ID.

‚∏ª

üßæ Step 4: Extract Each Line Item

Use the Create Item tool for each item and extract the following data:
 - product code
 - description
 - unit price
 - quantity
 - unit type
 - sub total
also use the record id returned from the Create Invoice tool, wrapped in an array: [value]. This should be passed to the Invoice (linked) field as an array to create the relationship.

Ignore zero quantity items.

‚∏ª

‚ö†Ô∏è Important Data Format Rules:
- Total Tax and Total Amount must be numbers only (no currency symbols)
- Invoice_linked must be a JSON array string containing the invoice record ID: ["rec123abc"]
- All date fields should be in YYYY-MM-DD format
- If any field is missing, use "MISSING" as the value

‚ö†Ô∏è Critical: When providing the Invoice_linked value, you MUST format it as a JSON array string like this: ["rec123abc"] where rec123abc is the actual record ID returned from the Create Invoice tool.

parameters.content:
üìã SETUP REQUIREMENTS

üîß Prerequisites:
‚Ä¢ Telegram Bot Token (from @BotFather)
‚Ä¢ OpenAI API Key (GPT-4o model access)
‚Ä¢ Airtable Account with API access

üìä Airtable Setup:
‚Ä¢ Base: 'Invoice Tracker Proper' (appG8Paox9E4p7vMR)
‚Ä¢ Table 1: 'Invoices' (tblKpTcfWab8jl8Ru)
‚Ä¢ Table 2: 'Line Items' (tblVqPbTLM5IgTnyW)
‚Ä¢ Ensure tables have all required fields as defined in nodes

üîê Credentials Needed:
‚Ä¢ Telegram Bot credentials
‚Ä¢ OpenAI API credentials
‚Ä¢ Airtable API credentials

ü§ñ INVOICE CATEGORISER WORKFLOW

üìù Purpose:
Automatically extracts invoice data from PDF files sent via Telegram and stores structured data in Airtable

üîÑ Process Flow:
1. Telegram message received
2. Check if PDF attachment exists
3. Extract text from PDF
4. AI processes and extracts data
5. Create invoice record in Airtable
6. Create line items in Airtable
7. Send confirmation to user

üí° Features:
‚Ä¢ PDF text extraction
‚Ä¢ AI-powered data extraction
‚Ä¢ Structured Airtable storage
‚Ä¢ Conversational memory
‚Ä¢ Error handling

üì± HOW TO USE

1Ô∏è‚É£ Start Conversation:
‚Ä¢ Send any message to the Telegram bot
‚Ä¢ Bot will ask for company/individual name

2Ô∏è‚É£ Upload Invoice:
‚Ä¢ Send PDF invoice as file attachment
‚Ä¢ Bot will automatically process the document

3Ô∏è‚É£ Data Extraction:
‚Ä¢ AI extracts invoice header information
‚Ä¢ AI extracts all line items
‚Ä¢ Data is automatically saved to Airtable

4Ô∏è‚É£ Confirmation:
‚Ä¢ Bot sends confirmation message
‚Ä¢ Check Airtable for extracted data

‚ö†Ô∏è Important:
‚Ä¢ Only PDF files are supported
‚Ä¢ Ensure invoice is clear and readable
‚Ä¢ Bot remembers conversation context

üìä AIRTABLE DATA STRUCTURE

üìã Invoices Table Fields:
‚Ä¢ Invoice Number, Date, Supplier
‚Ä¢ Supplier Address, Tax ID
‚Ä¢ PO Number, Due Date
‚Ä¢ Receiver Name, Address
‚Ä¢ Total Tax, Total Amount
‚Ä¢ Delivery Date

üì¶ Line Items Table Fields:
‚Ä¢ Product Code, Description
‚Ä¢ Unit Price, Quantity, Unit Type
‚Ä¢ Sub Total
‚Ä¢ Invoice (linked to Invoices table)

üîó Relationships:
‚Ä¢ Line Items linked to parent Invoice
‚Ä¢ One-to-many relationship
‚Ä¢ Automatic record linking via AI

üîß TROUBLESHOOTING

‚ùå Common Issues:

üìÑ PDF Not Processing:
‚Ä¢ Check file is actually PDF format
‚Ä¢ Ensure file size is reasonable
‚Ä¢ Verify PDF contains readable text

ü§ñ AI Not Responding:
‚Ä¢ Check OpenAI API key validity
‚Ä¢ Verify GPT-4o model access
‚Ä¢ Check API usage limits

üìä Airtable Errors:
‚Ä¢ Verify base and table IDs
‚Ä¢ Check field names match exactly
‚Ä¢ Ensure API permissions are correct

üí¨ Telegram Issues:
‚Ä¢ Verify bot token is active
‚Ä¢ Check webhook configuration
‚Ä¢ Ensure bot has message permissions

üîÑ Memory Issues:
‚Ä¢ Each chat has separate memory
‚Ä¢ Memory persists across sessions
‚Ä¢ Clear by restarting workflow

‚öôÔ∏è CONFIGURATION NOTES

üéØ AI Agent Settings:
‚Ä¢ Uses GPT-4o model for accuracy
‚Ä¢ Structured prompts for consistency
‚Ä¢ Memory enabled for context
‚Ä¢ Tools connected for Airtable operations

üìã Data Validation:
‚Ä¢ Numbers extracted without currency symbols
‚Ä¢ Dates in YYYY-MM-DD format
‚Ä¢ Missing fields marked as 'MISSING'
‚Ä¢ Zero quantity items ignored

üîÑ Workflow Logic:
‚Ä¢ Switch node filters PDF files only
‚Ä¢ Extract from File handles PDF parsing
‚Ä¢ Edit Fields prepares data for AI
‚Ä¢ AI Agent orchestrates the entire process

‚ö° Performance Tips:
‚Ä¢ Keep PDF files under 10MB
‚Ä¢ Use clear, high-quality scans
‚Ä¢ Ensure text is machine-readable
